title: Can not use Chinese Characters when using Use the new Stata Jupyter kernel with Atom's Hydrogen package
body:
When my code contains Chinese Characters, it reports: 
> UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode bytes in position 75-76: invalid continuation byte

The detail description is that when I draw one picture using command line, the first picture goes well. However, when I run the second command, this does not work, and report the above error. Then, I rerun the first command, it goes well. Strangely, the second picture that I want to draw comes out together.

My command is like this:
```
line mcar car100 car300 trddt, ytitle("CAR(等权)") xtitle("交易日") legend(label(1 "A股") label(2 "Top100") label(3 "Top300"))

line wcar wcar100 wcar300 trddt, ytitle("CAR(市值加权)") xtitle("交易日") legend(label(1 "A股") label(2 "Top100") label(3 "Top300"))
```
The full message is like this:
> [IPKernelApp] ERROR | Exception in message handler: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ipykernel/kernelbase.py", line 233, in dispatch_shell handler(stream, idents, msg) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ipykernel/kernelbase.py", line 399, in execute_request user_expressions, allow_stdin) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/kernel.py", line 81, in do_execute text_to_run, md5, text_to_exclude=text_to_exclude) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/stata_session.py", line 195, in do rc, res = self.expect(text=text, child=child, md5=md5, **kwargs) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/stata_session.py", line 242, in expect match_index = child.expect(expect_list, timeout=None) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/spawnbase.py", line 341, in expect timeout, searchwindowsize, async_) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/spawnbase.py", line 369, in expect_list return exp.expect_loop(timeout) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/expect.py", line 111, in expect_loop incoming = spawn.read_nonblocking(spawn.maxread, timeout) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/pty_spawn.py", line 485, in read_nonblocking return super(spawn, self).read_nonblocking(size) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/spawnbase.py", line 178, in read_nonblocking s = self._decoder.decode(s, final=False) File "/Applications/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/codecs.py", line 321, in decode (result, consumed) = self._buffer_decode(data, self.errors, final) UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode bytes in position 75-76: invalid continuation byte

The version of my stata_kernel is 1.4.8 on the Mac OS.
